meanings.definition: a group of people who move from place to place in search of pasture for their livestock
meanings.sent1: The seminomads traveled far to find fresh grass for their animals.
meanings.sent2: The seminomads set up camp in a new area every few weeks.
meanings.sent3: The seminomads joked that their cows were the real leaders of the group.
meanings.sent4: The seminomads were like modern-day cowboys, roaming the land with their herds.
meanings.sent5: The image of the seminomads herding their livestock under the open sky was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: a person who leads a nomadic lifestyle, often moving between different locations for work or leisure
meanings.sent1: As a seminomad, she enjoyed the freedom of constantly exploring new places.
meanings.sent2: The seminomad artist found inspiration in the changing landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The seminomad chef cooked up delicious dishes from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: The seminomad's heart belonged to the road, always seeking new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The seminomad's life was a tapestry woven with threads of travel and discovery.
